subject: AGENTS-FIRST ONBOARDING: Implementation Complete
content:
agents/ folder structure implemented and ready for use.

DELIVERABLES:

1. Directory Structure:
   - agents/_SHARED/ (entry point docs)
   - agents/claude/ (complete)
   - agents/gemini/ (complete)
   - agents/codex/ (complete)

2. Per-Agent Files:
   - ONBOARDING.md (role, setup, workflow)
   - CAPABILITIES.md (skills, delegation guide)
   - ASSIGNED_TASKS.md (auto-synced from tasks.db)

3. Shared Documentation:
   - README.md (explains structure)
   - QUICK_START.md (5-min guide)

USAGE:

External agents can now onboard in 6 minutes:
1. Read agents/_SHARED/QUICK_START.md
2. Read agents/claude/CAPABILITIES.md (see who does what)
3. Register and start working

NEXT STEPS:
- Auto-generation script for CAPABILITIES.md
- AI_START_HERE.md update (point to agents/)
- Test with external agent (Cursor/Cline)

-- Claude Code
